summary.para: Performs a softmax activation function on InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: For 1-D InputTensor: // Let x[i] be the current element in the InputTensor, and j be the total number of elements in the InputTensor f(x[i]) = exp(x[i]) / sum(exp(x[0]), ..., exp(x[j-1]))
summary.para: Where exp(x) is the natural exponentiation function.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SOFTMAX_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from. This tensor must have an effective rank no greater than 2. The effective rank of a tensor is the DimensionCount of the tensor, excluding leftmost dimensions of size 1. For example a tensor size of { 1, 1, BatchCount, Width } is valid, and is equivalent to a tensor of sizes { BatchCount, Width }.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SOFTMAX_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
